effect.sword_shield: Inflicts regular damage. User is forced to use this move for five turns. Power doubles every time this move is used in succession to a maximum of 16x, and resets to normal after the lock-in ends. If this move misses or becomes unusable, the lock-in ends. If the user has used defense curl since entering the field, this move has double power.

If the user has used defense curl since entering the field, this move has double power.

short_effect.sword_shield: Power doubles every turn this move is used in succession after the first, resetting after five turns.
short_effect.the_isle_of_armor: Power doubles every turn this move is used in succession after the first, resetting after five turns.

short_effect.legends_arceus: Power doubles every turn this move is used in succession after the first, resetting after five turns.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. It becomes more powerful each time it hits.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user rolls into the target to deal damage, then becomes fixated on using this move.
